title: Can't log in in my pbe account?
body: a week ago, I signed up for my pbe account and associated my main one to the pbe one. Today, I downloaded the PBE, but when I try to log in it says that my username or password are incorrect. Now, I can't rembember exactly, but does the pbe account have a different username and password that I forgot or it's an actual problem?

replies.body: Indeed, PBE has different credentials than your live account.  If you need some assistance with recovery, reach out through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account team can help you directly.
